alert.note: Alert for Armstrong; Donley; Gray; Palo Duro Canyon; Randall (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 10:13PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Armstrong, eastern Randall, Gray and Donley Counties through 1115 PM CDT... At 1013 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 5 miles southwest of Codman to 6 miles west of Howardwick to 4 miles west of Wayside. Movement was southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Clarendon, Claude, Lake Tanglewood, Mclean, Lefors, Howardwick, Lelia Lake, Lake Mcclellan, Wayside, Palo Duro Canyon, Goodnight, Alanreed, Greenbelt Lake and Timbercreek Canyon. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Armstrong; Donley; Gray; Palo Duro Canyon; Randall
